module.name: clock
module.summary: Policy for reading and setting the hardware clock.

interface.name: clock_domtrans
interface.summary: Execute hwclock in the clock domain.

param.name: domain
param.summary: The type of the process performing this action.

interface.name: clock_run
interface.summary: Execute hwclock in the clock domain, and allow the specified role the hwclock domain.

param.name: domain
param.summary: The type of the process performing this action.

param.name: role
param.summary: The role to be allowed the clock domain.

param.name: terminal
param.summary: The type of the terminal allow the clock domain to use.

interface.name: clock_exec
interface.summary: Execute hwclock in the caller domain.

param.name: domain
param.summary: The type of the process performing this action.

interface.name: clock_dontaudit_write_adjtime
interface.summary: Do not audit attempts to write clock drift adjustments.

interface.name: clock_rw_adjtime
interface.summary: Read and write clock drift adjustments.
